name: Confessional
description:
A game about secrets and forgiveness.

Let your feelings out and see what happens. Take your time.

Things will happen besides typing.

The game is based on experiences I had as a kid, hiding away on the computer in a rough home.

Ludum Dare 31 entry. Theme "Entire Game on One Screen"

[LD31 results]

...

Hint: (minor spoiler)

There are two endings.
